text: Phaedon concinnus is a species of leaf beetle in the genus Phaedon. It is associated with Plantago maritima and Triglochin maritimum ==Description== P. concinnus adult beetles measure 3.2-4.1 mm in length. They are bright metallic green to greenish-blue in colour, occasionally coppery. ==References== Category:Beetles described in 1831 Category:Chrysomelinae
title: Phaedon concinnus
